title: Reflector

fields.name: Abilities:
fields.value: - Redirect a kill from one player to another.

fields.name: Attributes:
fields.value: - Choose 2 players at night. Any kills that happen to one of them during that night or the next day will be switched to the other. This effects executions.

desc:
Post 443
*"I have the perfect counter to bullets!"*
*"...that's a mirror."*
